# Table of Safe Meals (WondArch)
## Overview
**Table of Safe Meals:** Any poisoned food or drink placed on this table immediately begins glowing with a faint black illumination. Anyone seated at the table may make a Wisdom check (DC 20) to determine the exact kind of poison. Such a table can seat up to twelve people.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Detect Poison (Spell)|detect poison]]**; Market Price:* 1,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 84
